# RevenueHunt Documentation

> Product recommendation quiz builder for Shopify, WooCommerce, BigCommerce, Magento, and Standalone stores.

RevenueHunt is an e-commerce quiz app that guides shoppers through tailored questions and recommends products based on their responses. Used by 4,000+ stores. Free plan available, paid plans start at $39/month.

## Content Negotiation

This documentation site supports content negotiation. To receive raw markdown instead of HTML:
- Request with header: `Accept: text/markdown`
- Or append `?format=md` to any URL

Example: `curl -H "Accept: text/markdown" https://docs.revenuehunt.com/how-to-guides/send-leads-to-hubspot`
